text: @AtishiAAP @ArvindKejriwal I think you cannot rise above petty politics. Every country, makes monument to show respect towards its leaders.  It's generating sufficient revenue for Govt. AAP is responsible for much rise of COVID19 cases and not doing enough to prevent it. So instead of blaming, do the job
